descriptionHtml:
Made a new skin for the Archmage robe. A little more \"magy\" i think but you decide. If you want some other improvements i will try to do it! :)
Oh and btw this is my first texture work so leave a comment on what i should improve on ;)
Work is layed down! Use this however you want. :)

INSTALL:
Just put the Texture folder in Skyrim/data to install

UNINSTALL:
Remove Skyrim/Data/Textures/clotes/archmage folder to uninstall.
author: Cooleoj
